title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 14 August 2014 - XWiki

08:11 <vfzevaze> jira.xwiki.org server is not running: Service Temporarily Unavailable

11:32 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:43 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
12:19 <vfzevaze> hi there! how can the extension info be updated on a extension page? http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/XWiki+Contrib+-+Macro+Redmine pressing the button did not do it  
12:40 <ClemensR> vfzevaze: ah thats a known bug, er feature, with some caching on e.x.o  (it caches the stare of the maven repo)  
12:40 <ClemensR> someone with access to the file system on the server need to remove the cached files, or restart the xwiki.org server  
12:41 <vfzevaze> is there a workaround?  
12:42 <vfzevaze> :O  
12:42 <ClemensR> last time vmassol helped me with this but it seems he takes his vacations seriously today, for a change  
12:42 <vfzevaze> ok, thank you anyway  
12:42 <ClemensR> I have no access to the server so I guess we have to wait a moment till someone who has access picks up the message  
12:43 <vfzevaze> maybe deleting the page and reimporting?  
12:47 <Denis1> has quit  
12:48 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
12:58 <Denis1> has quit  
12:59 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
13:08 <ClemensR> vfzevaze: better just wait, or write a mail to the xwiki-devs list. I think deleting and restoring the page will just produce the cached (old) version of the extension  
13:14 <vfzevaze> thanks! i will write a mail /notice ClemensR
